sentences.en: A simple keyhole mounting system allows effortlessly quick wall installation.
sentences.cn: 简易的锁眼安装系统,确保简便易行.

sentences.en: As he faced the cool gray eyes which, effortlessly, seemed to bore into him.
sentences.cn: 他看到那双冷淡的大眼睛似乎漫不经心地直盯着自己的脸.

sentences.en: Everyone recognizes these incredibly complex patterns effortlessly and reliably.
sentences.cn: 每个人可以容易地并可靠地认识这些无法相信的复杂的式样.

sentences.en: Her son Peter adapted effortlessly to his new surroundings.
sentences.cn: 她儿子彼得很快就适应了新环境。

sentences.en: It allows users to effortlessly connect to 　 Internet and network resources.
sentences.cn: 它可以让用户不费力气就能接到因特网和网络资源上.

sentences.en: Our only companion is the wandering albatross, which glides effortlessly and gracefully behind the yacht.
sentences.cn: 陪伴我们的仅有那只盘旋的信天翁，它在游艇后面优雅轻盈地翱翔。

sentences.en: Pervasive computing can help us manage information quickly, efficiently and effortlessly.
sentences.cn: 普适计算能帮助我们快捷 、 高效、毫不费力地管理信息.

sentences.en: Schumacher adapted effortlessly to his new surroundings.
sentences.cn: 舒马赫非常轻松地适应了新环境。

sentences.en: The boat cut effortlessly through the water.
The poem continues effortlessly through hundreds of lines as well turned and snobbish as the famous.
sentences.cn: 诗人轻而易举地把这首诗继续写下去,洋洋数百行,行行都象下列名句一样精巧、神气十足.

sentences.en: The wind blew stronger, and the little boat rampaged along effortlessly.
sentences.cn: 风刮得更猛烈了, 小船毫不费力地飞速行驶.

sentences.en: Then there were angels moving effortlessly up and down that great stairway.
sentences.cn: 而天使们在梯子上轻盈地上去下来.

sentences.en: There is so much information you can almost effortlessly find the facts for yourself.
sentences.cn: 资料这么多，你几乎可以毫不费力地找到事实真相。

sentences.en: To my astonishment, the man lifted the rock effortlessly.
sentences.cn: 使我吃惊的是, 那汉子毫不费劲地把石块举了起来.

sentences.en: We stood in silence watching the snake glide effortlessly.
sentences.cn: 我们噤若寒蝉地站着,眼看那条蛇逍遥自在地游来游去.
